items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have to wear a suit and tie to work.

Tom doesn\'t know how things turned out this way.

Tom didn\'t want to stop doing what he was doing.

Who\'s that cute girl I saw you with at the mall?
I wonder whether or not Tom has done that before.
I wonder whether or not Tom is telling the truth.
I wonder whether or not Tom knows how to do that.

I suspect that Tom and Mary aren\'t in Australia.
I can\'t believe three years has already gone by.

It\'s the first time that that has ever happened.
